ðŸ“– Summary: Hector RAG is a modular RAG framework built on PostgreSQL, offering advanced retrieval methods and fusion techniques. It enables developers to create sophisticated RAG pipelines for AI applications, leveraging the efficiency of PostgreSQL for vector storage and retrieval. The framework supports multiple retrieval methods and Reciprocal Rank Fusion for enhanced accuracy.
